verbose_text: We analyzed Nestin-GFP mice as an optimal reporter mouse for the expression of nestin, and although we showed the previously reported expression in pericytes (XREF_FIG A-4C), neural stem cells (XREF_FIG B), and oligodendrocyte precursor cells (XREF_FIG A and 4C), we did not find evidence of nestin expression in microglia (Iba1 +) (XREF_FIG A-4C).
